contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Career Fair Releases Fifth Issue of ‘Career’ Magazine

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Career Fair (QCF) has released the fifth issue of its ‘Career’ magazine.

The annual bilingual magazine, designed to be used as a career guide for students and professionals, is aligned with QF’s mission to unlock human potential by creating awareness of education, employment, training and career development opportunities available in different sectors in the country.

The 64-page issue contains career information, tips and topics of interest from career development experts, for people looking for guidance in following a suitable career path.

Topics covered in the new issue include, best careers for different personality types and entrepreneurship and great business ideas. In addition, there are valuable tips on how to write a CV and covering letter, how to perform well during interviews, and a number of positive steps to ensure a continuing and flourishing career progression.

For the full story, please click here.
